entity.name: In Chicago, Trump calls the city an embarrassment to the US
entity.description: Donald Trump has opened his first visit to Chicago as president by disparaging the city as "embarrassing to us as a nation"

text:
@robreiner You're delusional. 

This is people being idiots. 

I suppose Trump wrecked the economy too? I'm sure that in your backward mind he invented Covid19...

People get murdered everyday - have you checked the stats on any given weekend in Chicago?? Where is your outrage for that?
